stimulusHtml: Which of the following describes how replacing line 3 with  for (int j = (elements.size() - 1); j >= 0; j--)  will affect the behavior of  linearSearch?

features.html:
Consider the method  linearSearch,  which takes an  ArrayList  of  Integer  elements and a target  int  value as parameters and returns the index of the first appearance of the target value in the list or  -1  if the target value does not appear in the list.

 

public static int linearSearch(ArrayList<Integer> elements, int target)
{
   for (int j = 0; j < elements.size(); j++)     // Line 3
   {
      if (elements.get(j) == target)
      {
         return j;
      }
   }
   return -1;
}

choicesHtml: The modification has no effect: the modified method will continue to return the index of the first appearance of the target value in the list, or  -1  if the target value does not appear in the list.
The modified method will return the index of the last appearance of the target value in the list, or  -1  if the target value does not appear in the list.
The modified method will throw an  IndexOutOfBoundsException.
The modified method will return  -1  regardless of the inputs.
